functions.name: maxCtxFont
functions.docstring: Calculate the usMaxContext value for an entire font.

functions.name: maxCtxSubtable
functions.docstring:
Calculate usMaxContext based on a single lookup table (and an existing
max value).

functions.name: maxCtxContextualSubtable
functions.docstring: Calculate usMaxContext based on a contextual feature subtable.

functions.name: maxCtxContextualRule
functions.docstring: Calculate usMaxContext based on a contextual feature rule.
